@dev Access control modifier that allows only the current owner to call the function.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
OwnershipTransfer

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfering the ownership is a two-step process, as we prepare
for the transfer by setting `newOwner` and requiring `newOwner` to accept
the transfer. This prevents accidental lock-out if something goes wrong
when passing the `newOwner` address.
     * @param _newOwner The address of the proposed new owner.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev The `newOwner` finishes the ownership transfer process by accepting the
ownership.
attributes.name: acceptOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev The standard ERC20 Token interface.

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20Token
 * @dev Implements the operations declared in the `ERC20TokenInterface`.
attributes.name: ERC20Token
balanceOf
transfer
transferFrom
approve

attributes.documentation:
@dev Increase the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment
allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
From MonolithDAO Token.sol
	 * @param _spender The address which will spend the funds.
@param _addedValue The amount of tokens to increase the allowance by.
attributes.name: increaseApproval

attributes.documentation:
@dev Decrease the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To decrement
allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
From MonolithDAO Token.sol
	 * @param _spender The address which will spend the funds.
@param _subtractedValue The amount of tokens to decrease the allowance by.
attributes.name: decreaseApproval
allowance

attributes.documentation: Don't accept ETH

@title Freezable
@dev This trait allows to freeze the transactions in a Token
attributes.name: Freezable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier makes methods callable only when the contract is not frozen.

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the owner to "freeze" the contract.

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the owner to "unfreeze" the contract.
